Message:
I started making the candy
together with Cerberus.

Though, since making
the candy syrup was dangerous,
I took over stirring the pot.

While the sugar cooked,
we could hear the sizzling crack
of its sweetness melting down.

And as it turned into syrup,
we could even hear
tiny bubbles popping...
Alright, I bet it’s almost ready!

“All we need to do now is
add some of our witch power,
and it’ll be done!”

“Yeah!
Let’s do it together, Cerberus,
on the count of...”

When I turned around,
Cerberus was wringing
her hands together,
a terrified expression
on her face.

That’s right...
She thought she’d killed
me with her power...

But, that wasn’t her fault.
It was because I...!

I grabbed hold of
the trembling Cerberus’s hands.
Things have changed since then.
I’ve even gotten stronger, too...!

I won’t let you cry anymore.
I want you to always have that
bright, innocent smile on your face.
That’s why...!

Just then,
a small light began to glow
from our clasped hands.
